local_intent: Verify contact with the T-block by lowering until contact and confirming force-threshold detection; retry up to three times if contact is not registered.
assumptions: Block is locally visible and roughly aligned before contact verification
Yaw/orientation suitable for planar contact has been set upstream
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan segment that lowers until contact during the push preparation, verifying contact before proceeding and allowing retries.
